answers.answer: Try a whole wheat diet, cut out as much sugar as possible, up your fruit, might help you a little. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and I have lost 8 lbs so far. Although I can't stay full but fruits are good, move to non fat milk.
Ur bloated it will get better
Thanks I've been struggling on what to eat to get optimal nutrition.  Im use to eating to lose weight.
I am 7 weeks have only gained 1.5 lbs. but my jeans don't fit either. Your not alone.
I too was working out for healthy outcomes. Lost maybe 15 lbs with my trainer, zumba classes and other physical activities. Then learned I was prego.  It will get better for you I hope.
I too was working out for healthy outcomes. Lost maybe 15 lbs with my trainer, zumba classes and other physical activities. Then learned I was prego.  It will get better for you I hope.
It's just bloating and water weight. It will get better.

question: I tried losing weight before I got pregnant.  Worked out hard for two months and didnt lose any! Now im 6 weeks pregnant and I already feel huge. Nothing fits.  And according to the scale I haven't gained. What could be the issue?  Appetite is down as I get full really fast and stay full.
title: feeling fat already 6 weeks
